traceability.evidence: Search of bin/dry-aged-deps.js and src/**/*.js shows no handling of `--update` or `--yes` flags. CLI help text does not list `--update` or `--yes`. No tests reference update behavior or backup creation. No code for preview/confirmation, package.json modification, or summary post-update.
traceability.notes: The story 011.0-DEV-AUTO-UPDATE is not implemented: none of the acceptance criteria for auto-updating package.json (flags, preview, confirmation, backup, install prompt, summary, error handling) are present.
